text: is a direct broadcast satellite (DBS) service that provides satellite television, audio programming and interactive television services to households in Japan, owned by parent company SKY Perfect JSAT Corporation. SKY PerfecTV! is also a direct broadcast satellite (DBS) service. While SKY PerfecTV! Premium Service use DVB-S and DVB-S2, SKY PerfecTV! Basic Service use ISDB-S. {| class="wikitable" |- style="text-align:center;" ! !! !! || |- style="text-align:center;" !System | DVB-S || DVB-S2 || ISDB-S |- style="text- align:center;" !Radio channel | Yes || Colspan=2 | No |- style="text- align:center;" !High-definition channel | No || Yes (HD only) || Yes |- style="text-align:center;" !Video | MPEG-2 || H.264/MPEG-4 AVC || MPEG-2 |- style="text-align:center;" !Audio | MPEG-1 Audio Layer II || MPEG-4 AAC || MPEG-2 AAC |- style="text-align:center;" !Encryption | multi2 || multi2 || B-CAS |- style="text-align:center;" !Copy control | Colspan=3 | Yes (Copy once) |- style="text-align:center;" !Channel |100 SD channels ||162 HD channels (3 4K channels) ||34 SD (35 HD channels) |- style="text- align:center;" !Satellite |colspan=2 |JCSAT-3A and JCSAT-4A || N-SAT-110, B-SAT3a, B-SAT3b and B-SAT3c |- style="text-align:center;" !Launched | September 30, 1996 || October 10, 2008 || January 1, 2002 |} ==See also== * WOWOW ==References== ==External links== * Category:Direct broadcast satellite services Category:Television networks in Japan Category:Television channels and stations established in 1994 Category:Entertainment companies of Japan
title: SKY PerfecTV!
